fields.name: globalShader
fields.description: Screen shader - used to draw the final screen

fields.name: background
fields.description: Background texture - stretched to fit behind the map

fields.name: chunkingEnabled
fields.description: Chunking - (advanced) enables/disables the character order rendering algorithm

fields.name: shaderDebug
fields.description: Some printouts for when shaders bug out

fields.name: enabled
fields.description: Whether or not to use shaders

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
